show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #13, Jeff Goodwin "Roots in the Ground Year Round"
subtitle: #13, Jeff Goodwin "Roots in the Ground Year Round"
summary:
Our friend Jeff Goodwin from Noble Research Institute joins us to talk about what Noble does, what they are doing, and what they can do for you.

Connect with Jeff on Instagram @Noble_landstewardship

www.noble.org
